description:
![Rust Analyzer Logo](https://cdn.statically.io/gh/rust-analyzer/rust-analyzer/9d9b343/assets/logo-wide.min.svg)
	
	rust-analyzer is an modular compiler frontend for the Rust language. It is a part of a larger rls-2.0 effort to create excellent IDE support for Rust.
summary: Language Server Protocol compatible compiler front-end for Rust.
author: Ferrous Systems
